description: {"blocks":[{"key":"e17q6","text":"This protocol details the procedure for immunohistochemical 3,3’-Diaminobenzidine (DAB) staining of free-floating fixed brain tissue sections using the avidin/biotin ABC complex to detect Green Fluorescence Protein (GFP).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b75ep","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aq5lm","text":"This protocol has been tested with free-floating non-human primate (NHP) brain tissue that has been fixed with 4% paraformaldehyde, cryoprotected with sucrose gradients, and cryo-sectioned  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":189,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"27okc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"50"}}}}

fork_info.title: Standard DAB Staining for Free-floating Fixed NHP Brain Tissue

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3n9jj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":360,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cb5f8","text":"Rinse in PBS on a shaker at  : 3 x 5 minutes.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"12fc4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9AC8C913C60011EEA8750A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"863EB140C53911EEA5CE0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dmi61","text":"Mount tissue on charged glass slides in 1:8 PBS in dH2O and let air dry. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":40,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":51,"length":4},{"style":"sub","offset":53,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3sqor","text":"Rinse slides with dH2O and let air dry (preferably in a hood).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":18,"length":4},{"style":"sub","offset":20,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
